type.label: Name
type.placeholder: Enter the name of the claim

delete.confirm: Do you really want to delete the following realm?
delete.title: Delete realm

secret.label: Secret
secret.placeholder: Paste a JWT secret in the input or leave it empty to securely generate a new secret
secret.warning: Changing the secret will invalidate all active tokens in this realm. Press the button below to revert the change.

requiredLength.label: Required Length
requiredLength.placeholder: Enter the minimum number of characters in a password

requiredUniqueChars.label: Required Unique Characters
requiredUniqueChars.placeholder: Enter the minimum number of unique characters in a password

requireConfirmedAccount.info: By enabling this setting, a confirmed email address or phone number will be required for users to sign-in and manage their account.
requireConfirmedAccount.label: Require confirmed account

requireUniqueEmail.info: By enabling this setting, email address uniqueness will be enforced upon user creation & update.
requireUniqueEmail.label: Require unique email address

url.label: Application URL
url.placeholder: Enter the web address (URL) of the application corresponding to this realm

allowedCharacters.label: Allowed Characters
allowedCharacters.placeholder: Enter all the characters allowed for usernames (e.g.: abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789-._{'@'}{'+'})
